Uses of Package
com.sri.kernel.i2c

Packages that use com.sri.kernel.i2c
com.sri.kernel Provides the core classes of the SR4 Kernel. 
com.sri.kernel.i2c Contains classes used in managing and using the I2C Bus. 
com.sri.kernel.modules Contains classes which make up the module system of the SR4 Kernel. 
 

Classes in com.sri.kernel.i2c used by com.sri.kernel
I2CManager
           This manages the I2C connection.
 

Classes in com.sri.kernel.i2c used by com.sri.kernel.i2c
I2CPort
           This class wraps the native I2C library, providing an interface to the underlying I2C bus.
PortInUseException
           Thrown when the requested I2C port is in use.
SMBusInputStream
           Represents an I2C input data stream using the SMBus protocol.
SMBusOutputStream
           Represents an I2C output data stream using the SMBus protocol.
 

Classes in com.sri.kernel.i2c used by com.sri.kernel.modules
I2CManager
           This manages the I2C connection.
